name: Uurnog Uurnlimited
description: Enter the wacky & whimsical world of Uurnog Uurnlimited! Explore a silly, puzzle-filled land full of cubes, bombs, weird people & adorable animals â€” then steal them all! Play single player or co-op as you jump, grab, throw & teleport your colorful collection back to the Save Room (and try not to destroy it).
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (64-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2GHz, x64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5000
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: Dual Core 2GHz, x64 Graphics: ATI Radeon HD5770 / GeForce GTX 650
